definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be strong (NH id., Hiph., esp. in bad sense, and esp. deriv. [[עַז]]; Ph. [[עז]] strength, also in n.pr. Lzb:338; Aram. 9az be mighty, strong, cf. OAram. Nab. Palm. n.pr. [[עזיזו]] Lzb:338 Cook:90; Ar. 9az=un be mighty, strong, Eth. 9azaza: id.; As. ezêzu, be furious, ezzu, fierce);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[יׇעׂז]] Ps 9:20, Ps 52:9, [[יׇעוֹז]] Da 11:12; 3 fs. [[תָּעׂז]] Ps 89:14, Ec 7:19, [[וַתָּ֫עָז]] Ju Jdg 3:10, Jdg 6:2; Imv. ms. [[עוּזׇּה]] Ps 68:29 (but v. infr.); Inf. cstr. [[עֲזוֹז]] Pr 8:28; —be strong, prevail, [[וַתָּ֫עָז יׇדוֹ עַל־]] Ju Jdg 3:10 and his hand prevailed against, so Jdg 6:2; [[אַל־תָּעׂז אֱנוֹשׁ]] Ps 9:20, Da 11:12; abs. [[תָּעׂז יׇֽדְְ]] Ps 89:14 (of ´[[י]]); of appar. strength of wicked Ps 52:9; [[בַּעֲזוֹז עִינוֹת תְּהוֹם]] Pr 8:28 when the fountains of the deep grew strong, i.e. firm, fixed; but Oort Bi Toy rd. [[בְּעַזְּזוֹ]] when he made firm, fixed fast (‖[[בְּאַמְּחוֹ]]); [[עוּוׇּה אֱלֽהִים]] Ps 68:29 Che Bae al. shew thyself strong, O God, who, etc., cf. Kö:i. 363; < ´[[עוֹז הָא]] the might, O God, wh., etc., Hup Du; [[הַחָכְמָה תָּעׂז לֶחָכָם]] Ec 7:19 wisdom is strong for the wise.—[[לָעוֹז]] Is 30:2 v. [[עוּז]].

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[חֵעֵז אִישׁ רָשָׁע בְּפָנׇיו]] Pr 21:29 a wicked man maketh firm (sheweth boldness) with his face; so 3 fs. [[הֵעֵ֫זׇה פָנֶיהָ]] Pr 7:13 (Ges:§ 67 dd Kö:i. 372) she maketh bold her face.
